Posts.Content: kitchenlogic wrote: Today I am 10 weeks out from my last chemo (cytoxan and taxotere) and all I have on my head to show for it is a light fluffy growth. This returning of the hair is taking forever!!!! Anybody else experience this and if so, can you tell me how much longer I'll have to wait? Thanks, Kathy Dx 1/26/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 1/18 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hair Growth at a Snail's Pace kitchenlogic jancie
